name: create_my_profile
description: Creates and authenticates a new member profile.

localizedFirstName.description: The member's first name as a string.

localizedLastName.description: The member's last name as a string.

vanityName.description: A URL-friendly version of the member's name.

localized.description: A dictionary mapping locale keys to localized names.

preferredLocale.description: A dictionary specifying the preferred locale with `country` (e.g., 'US') and `language` (e.g., 'en') codes.

firstName.description: A dictionary for the localized first name, with keys `localized` (a locale-to-name map) and `preferredLocale` (containing country and language codes).

localized.description: A dictionary mapping locale codes to their localized name string values.

preferredLocale.description: A dictionary specifying the preferred locale with `country` (e.g., 'US') and `language` (e.g., 'en') codes.

lastName.description: A dictionary for the localized last name, containing `localized` (a dictionary mapping locale keys to localized names) and `preferredLocale` (a dictionary with country and language codes).

person_data.description: A dictionary containing the new member's profile data, including keys for `localizedFirstName`, `localizedLastName`, `vanityName`, `firstName`, and `lastName`.

localized.description: A dictionary mapping locale codes, formatted as `<language>_<COUNTRY>`, to localized names.

preferredLocale.description: A dictionary indicating LinkedIn's main or default language/country version for localized content, containing `country` and `language` keys.

name.description: A dictionary for the localized organization name, including `localized` (locale-specific names by `language_COUNTRY` keys) and `preferredLocale` (main locale's country and language codes).

primaryOrganizationType.description: The type of organization, which can be 'COMPANY' or 'SCHOOL'.

organization_data.description: A dictionary containing the new organization's data, with `vanityName` (string), `name` (a localized name object with `localized` and `preferredLocale` sub-keys), and `primaryOrganizationType` (either 'COMPANY' or 'SCHOOL').

name: create_organization_acl
description: Creates a new organization ACL record.

roleAssignee.description: URN of the person to assign the role to (e.g., 'urn:li:person:1').

role.description: The role to assign to the person; must be one of 'ADMINISTRATOR', 'DIRECT_SPONSORED_CONTENT_POSTER', 'RECRUITING_POSTER', 'LEAD_CAPTURE_ADMINISTRATOR', 'LEAD_GEN_FORMS_MANAGER', 'ANALYST', 'CURATOR', or 'CONTENT_ADMINISTRATOR'.

state.description: Initial state of the ACL, one of 'ACTIVE', 'REQUESTED', 'REJECTED', or 'REVOKED'.

acl_data.description: A dictionary containing new ACL record data, including `roleAssignee` (person URN), `role` (an enumerated string like 'ADMINISTRATOR'), `organization` (organization URN), and `state` (an enumerated string like 'ACTIVE').

author.description: The URN of the post author (e.g., 'urn:li:person:1' or 'urn:li:organization:1').

visibility.description: Visibility setting of the post, one of 'PUBLIC', 'CONNECTIONS', 'LOGGED_IN', or 'CONTAINER'.

post_data.description: A dictionary of new post data, including `author` (a URN), `commentary` (the post content), and `visibility` (one of 'PUBLIC', 'CONNECTIONS', 'LOGGED_IN', or 'CONTAINER').

acl_id.description: Unique ID of the ACL record to delete.

name: delete_organization_by_id
description: Deletes an organization by its ID.

organization_id.description: Unique identifier of the organization to delete.

query_field.description: The query parameter that must be 'vanityName'.

vanity_name.description: The organization's vanity name to delete.

post_id.description: Unique identifier of the post to delete.

name: find_posts_by_author
description: Retrieve posts by author identifier with pagination.

author.description: The author's identifier used to filter posts, such as `urn:li:person:1` or `urn:li:organization:1`.

start.description: The starting index for pagination, which must be a non-negative integer and defaults to 0.

count.description: The maximum number of posts to return; must be a non-negative integer and defaults to 10.

name: get_my_profile
description: Retrieve the authenticated member's profile data.

projection.description: A string for field projection, using comma-separated field names and optionally enclosed in parentheses, to control which fields to return.

name: get_organization_acls_by_role_assignee
description: Retrieves ACL records detailing a LinkedIn member's (role assignee's) roles and permissions within organizations by roleAssignee URN, with optional field projection and pagination.

role_assignee.description: URN of the person whose ACL records are requested, e.g., `urn:li:person:1`.

projection.description: Field projection syntax to control which fields to return, consisting of comma-separated names optionally enclosed in parentheses, defaulting to `None`.

start.description: The starting index for pagination, defaulting to 0.

count.description: The number of items to return; defaults to 10.

name: get_organizations_by_vanity_name
description: Retrieves organizations by vanity name, supporting optional field projection and pagination.

vanity_name.description: The organization's vanity name to search for.

projection.description: A string for field projection, specifying comma-separated field names to return, optionally enclosed in parentheses. Defaults to `None`.

start.description: The starting index for pagination; defaults to 0.

count.description: Number of items to return; defaults to 10.

name: get_post_by_id
description: Retrieve a post by its identifier with optional field projection.

post_id.description: Unique identifier of the post to retrieve.

projection.description: A string specifying comma-separated field names for projection, optionally enclosed in parentheses. Defaults to None.

start.description: Starting index for pagination; defaults to 0 and must be non-negative.

count.description: Number of items to return; defaults to 10 and must be positive.

name: update_my_profile
description: Updates the authenticated member's profile data.

vanityName.description: The URL-friendly version of the member's name.

localized.description: A dictionary mapping locale keys to the localized name.

preferredLocale.description: A dictionary specifying a preferred locale with 'country' (e.g., 'US') and 'language' (e.g., 'en') codes.

firstName.description: A dictionary containing the localized first name, with `localized` names mapped by locale and `preferredLocale` settings.

localized.description: A dictionary mapping locale keys to the localized name.

preferredLocale.description: A dictionary containing 'country' (e.g., 'US') and 'language' (e.g., 'en') codes for the preferred locale.

lastName.description: A dictionary for the localized last name, including `localized` strings by locale and `preferredLocale` details.

person_data.description: An updated member profile data dictionary with defined keys.

name: update_organization_acl
description: Update an existing organization ACL record.

acl_id.description: Unique identifier of the ACL record to update.

roleAssignee.description: The updated URN of the person assigned the role, for example `urn:li:person:1`.

role.description: The updated role assigned to the person, one of 'ADMINISTRATOR', 'DIRECT_SPONSORED_CONTENT_POSTER', 'RECRUITING_POSTER', 'LEAD_CAPTURE_ADMINISTRATOR', 'LEAD_GEN_FORMS_MANAGER', 'ANALYST', 'CURATOR', 'CONTENT_ADMINISTRATOR'.

organization.description: Updated URN of the organization, for example `urn:li:organization:1`.

state.description: The updated state of the ACL, one of 'ACTIVE', 'REQUESTED', 'REJECTED', or 'REVOKED'.

acl_data.description: A dictionary containing the updated ACL data, with keys: `roleAssignee` (the person's URN, e.g., 'urn:li:person:1'), `role` (one of 'ADMINISTRATOR', 'DIRECT_SPONSORED_CONTENT_POSTER', 'RECRUITING_POSTER', 'LEAD_CAPTURE_ADMINISTRATOR', 'LEAD_GEN_FORMS_MANAGER', 'ANALYST', 'CURATOR', 'CONTENT_ADMINISTRATOR'), `organization` (the organization's URN, e.g., 'urn:li:organization:1'), and `state` (one of 'ACTIVE', 'REQUESTED', 'REJECTED', 'REVOKED').

name: update_organization_by_id
description: Update an existing organization's data and return the updated organization data.

organization_id.description: Unique identifier of the organization to update.

vanityName.description: The updated vanity name; for example, 'global-tech'.

localized.description: A dictionary mapping locale codes (e.g., 'en_US') to their localized organization names.

preferredLocale.description: A dictionary specifying the main or default language/country version for localized content, with `country` and `language` keys.

name.description: A dictionary for the updated localized organization name, structured with `localized` and `preferredLocale` keys.

primaryOrganizationType.description: Specifies the organization type as 'COMPANY' or 'SCHOOL'.

organization_data.description: A dictionary containing updated organization data, with keys: `vanityName` (str), `name` (a dictionary with `localized` names by locale and `preferredLocale` for country/language), and `primaryOrganizationType` (str, 'COMPANY' or 'SCHOOL').

post_id.description: Unique identifier of the post to update.

author.description: The updated URN of the post author, such as `urn:li:person:1` or `urn:li:organization:1`.

visibility.description: The post's updated visibility setting, one of 'PUBLIC', 'CONNECTIONS', 'LOGGED_IN', or 'CONTAINER'.

post_data.description: A dictionary containing updated post data, including `author` (a URN, e.g., 'urn:li:person:1'), `commentary` (post content), and `visibility` (one of 'PUBLIC', 'CONNECTIONS', 'LOGGED_IN', 'CONTAINER').
